column5: Was screaming and laughing my head off during the 5 round war between the Super Samoan and Bigfoot. Had to be THE BEST hw fight I've ever seen, bar none.  While I had Hunt winning, I'm not going to complain about the draw.  Takeya Mizugaki also impressed the hell out of me.
I tend to get loud during GSP fights, although in the last fight it was more like yelps of fear when he was getting hit...
Last time I heard anyone scream at the tv was when the BEATLES were on the Ed Sullivan show and my sister went into hysterics...........    vance
That heavyweight battle was great. It's surprising how much damage their punches do even when they're at the point of complete exhaustion. Scary.

Didn't know it ti'll taking the wife to her first NHL game at "The Garage" but from the second section she can pretty well turn every head within a hundred yards radius when she gets piped up.  Like that every sporting event and concert... and loves her GSP on TV too.  Shhheeesh!
Screaming at the ref when he checked bigfoot in round 5. Let him recover. Maybe Hunt would of had a tko. Killed his momentum.
Just watch your TV bill over the next 2 months is all I CAN say about UFC 167...  LOL!
One of the best fights in the past few years.  They were both throwing BOMBS!!!!!
Just saw the fight today.... INCREDIBLE!!! Best fight I've seen in that weight class, quite possibly ever. They should have gave Hunt the win.
I don't watch UFC but I certainly scream a lot at coach Casey when I'm watching the Craptors.
Screaming at the ref when he checked bigfoot in round 5. Let him recover. Maybe Hunt would of had a tko. Killed his momentum.   yeah I thought the same
